team_info

time_info <- c(html_text(html_nodes(site_info, "#scoring tr .right")))
game = rep(game, length(time_info))


just_team = FALSE
scorer = c()
teams = c()
count = 0
for(val in team_info) {

  } else {
    if(just_team) {
      scorer = c(scorer, val)
      just_team = FALSE
    } else {
      if(val %in% team_abbrevs) {
        just_team = TRUE
        teams = c(teams, val)
      }
    }
  }
}
